title: Java Starter Kit
subtitle: Powered by Angular
description: A modern, production-ready starter template combining the power of Spring Boot and Angular with best practices built-in.
adminDashboardDesc: Ready-to-use admin panel with responsive layout
featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to build your next application
secureAuthDesc: JWT-based authentication with role-based access control and session management
multiModuleDesc: Organized Maven structure with separate modules for web, batch, and common logic
productionReadyDesc: Docker support, DevTools, MapStruct, Lombok - everything configured and ready
ctaSubtitle: Get started with the most complete Java + Angular starter kit
